tokens.text: analyzes script files for Minecraft Script API usage

title: Script Analysis
description: Analyzes JavaScript/TypeScript script files to identify Minecraft Script API usage. Parses code to extract API references and usage patterns.

fields.title: APIs Used
fields.description: Tracks which Minecraft Script APIs are being used in the project. Identifies imports from @minecraft/ modules and API method calls.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the API name or method being referenced
